summary: Combine a field from many items into a list in a single item.

parameters.name: aggregate
parameters.description: Choose how to aggregate the fields: individually or all item data into a single list.

parameters.name: fieldsToAggregate
parameters.description: Specify the fields to aggregate, and optionally rename the output field.

parameters.name: destinationFieldName
parameters.description: Specify the output field name to put the aggregated data in when aggregating all item data.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Choose to include all fields, specified fields, or exclude specified fields when aggregating all item data.

parameters.name: fieldsToExclude
parameters.description: Specify the fields to exclude when including all fields except some.

parameters.name: fieldsToInclude
parameters.description: Specify the fields to include when including only specified fields.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional options for the aggregation process.
